lead_paragraph: A top county official from New York City's northern suburbs announced Wednesday that he will run for governor, launching an uphill fight to unseat heavily favored incumbent Democratic Gov. Andrew Cuomo.

headline.main: GOP County Official Announces Run for NY Governor
headline.print_headline: GOP County Official Announces Run for NY Governor

snippet: A top county official from New York City's northern suburbs announced Wednesday that he will run for governor, launching an uphill fight to unseat heavily favored incumbent Democratic Gov. Andrew Cuomo....
